Leo was walking, unsuspecting that the alarm had been set off. He knew
someone had to be watching, but he didn't know who, or where to look.

Leo: Shoo! Shtupid Dracon! Always on our backses! We're tired of him,
yes! And stupid Aries! He thinkses he's so great! Well, we wants to be
the bosses now! Yes! Leo is bosses!

He started bouncing around, flapping his wings, happy of his resolution.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Hydras::
> 
> Hydras wait ready, for everything
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> > In a message dated 11/24/03 10:00:39 PM Central Standard Time, 
> > airly2002@h... writes:
> > 
> > 
> > > the alarms rang showing that intruders are around the base, 
> Hydras 
> > > broke that magic moment and said "It's time to receive our guest 
> > > Maxima, we should give them welcoem that they won't forget it..."
> > 
> > Snapping to... as the alarms ran out. 
> > 
> > > 
> > > Hydras took his weapon and moved towards exit, while he motioned 
> the 
> > > femme do the same.
> > > 
> > > Soon he will be outside facing those intruders.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> >  She followed him, her weapons at ready as she moved up beside 
> him. Her 
> > crimson optics glared at the intruders.
